languages.text: {n}Голос Ахиллеаса тает, становится мягким и вкрадчивым, почти таким, каким он был в прежней жизни.{/n} "Желаю вам удачи, Ваша Светлость. Не верю, что у вас получится победить, но может быть получится уйти более достойно, чем получилось у меня".

{n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Ахиллеаса тает, становится мягким и вкрадчивым, почти таким, каким он был в прежней жизни.{/n} "Желаю вам удачи, Ваша Светлость. Не верю, что у вас получится победить, но может быть получится уйти более достойно, чем получилось у меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe that you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe that you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Achilleas se fait plus basse, plus douce et convaincante, rappelant celle de son ancienne vie.{/n} « Je vous souhaite bonne chance, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne pense pas que vous remporterez la victoire, mais je vous souhaite d'avoir une fin plus honorable que la mienne. »
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Achilleas se fait plus basse, plus douce et convaincante, rappelant celle de son ancienne vie.{/n} « Je vous souhaite bonne chance, Votre Seigneurie. Je ne pense pas que vous remporterez la victoire, mais je vous souhaite d'avoir une fin plus honorable que la mienne. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}阿吉里亚斯的声音平静下来，变得既柔和、又婉转，几乎就像他曾经的样子一样。{/n}“祝您好运，大人。我不相信您能战胜敌人，但或许您可以比我更体面地结束。”
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿吉里亚斯的声音平静下来，变得既柔和、又婉转，几乎就像他曾经的样子一样。{/n}“祝您好运，大人。我不相信你战胜敌人，但或许您可以比我更体面地结束。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}アキレアスの声が静かで柔らかく、まるで前世のもののように変わった。{/n}「幸運をお祈りいたします、閣下。あなたが勝利なさるとは思っておりませんが、私よりも名誉のある負け方はできるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}アキレアスの声が静かで柔らかく、まるで前世のもののように変わった。{/n}「幸運をお祈りいたします、閣下。あなたが勝利なさるとは思っておりませんが、私よりも名誉のある負け方はできるかもしれません」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas' Stimme wird leise, sanft und eindringlich. Sie klingt dadurch fast so wie in seinem früheren Leben.{/n} "Ich wünsche Euch viel Glück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich glaube nicht, dass Ihr siegen werdet, aber vielleicht schafft Ihr es ja, einen ehrenvolleren Abgang hinzulegen als ich."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas' Stimme wird leise, sanft und eindringlich. Sie klingt dadurch fast so wie in seinem früheren Leben.{/n} "Ich wünsche Euch viel Glück, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich glaube nicht, dass Ihr siegen werdet, aber vielleicht schafft Ihr es ja, einen ehrenvolleren Abgang hinzulegen als ich."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}La voz de Achilleas se suaviza, volviéndose meliflua y sugerente, casi como era en su vida previa.{/n} «Le deseo suerte, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No creo que tenga ninguna oportunidad, pero tal vez su marcha de este mundo sea más honorable que la mía».
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Achilleas se suaviza, volviéndose meliflua y sugerente, casi como era en su vida previa.{/n} «Le deseo suerte, mi{mf|lord|lady}. No creo que tenga ninguna oportunidad, pero tal vez su marcha de este mundo sea más honorable que la mía».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: {n}Achilleas'ın sesi kısılıyor, önceki hayatındaki sesini andırırcasına yumuşayıp imalı bir ton kazanıyor.{/n} "Bahtınız açık olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Galip geleceğinize inanmıyorum. Gelgelelim benimkinden daha saygın bir ölümü tadacak olabilirsiniz."
languages.original_text: {n}Achilleas's voice quiets, becoming soft and insinuating, almost like it was in his former life.{/n} "I wish you luck, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I do not believe you will prevail, but you might be able to make a more honourable exit than I did."

traits.locale_text: {n}Achilleas'ın sesi kısılıyor, önceki hayatındaki sesini andırırcasına yumuşayıp imalı bir ton kazanıyor.{/n} "Bahtınız açık olsun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Galip geleceğinize inanmıyorum. Gelgelelim benimkinden daha saygın bir ölümü tadacak olabilirsiniz."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
